title: CURATED STORMS
description: CURATED STORMS - is an extensive sound library containing 155 unique files of Storms (Thunder, Lightning, Hail, Sleet, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED STORMS - is an extensive sound library containing 155 unique files of Storms (Thunder, Lightning, Hail, Sleet, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from city streets, back alleys, parks, forests, windows and cars to ships, mountain tops, tin roofs and valleys. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  155 Unique .wav files of various types of storms.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 155

Number of Audio Cues: 155

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 Hours 18 Minutes 39 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sWc7yNqiGVBZK4BY-wtPPf-md0NKSXDp/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-storms-demo?si=70bb13692a944ad498ffc244b603f56c&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
